original_title: Gallegher: The Mystery of Edward Sims
overview: The cub reporter, Gallegher, becomes involved in a land fraud, when some valueless land is sold to a group of Cornish immigrants. A murder implicates one of the immigrants, and it is up to Gallegher to prove that a local resident is actually the murderer and the swindler is a local banker.
title: Gallegher: The Mystery of Edward Sims
